Name: Rocky Left Bank
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A slightly sweet, hopefully crowd-pleasing, combo of gin, elderflower and white wine.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly at The Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Rocky Left Bank contains 180 calories
